desc: Juice made from a mixture of golden ingredients. Not, uh... Not very good, honestly.

name: Prelude to Love
desc: Strawberries and pink melons mixed together to form the sweet & sour taste of love. Might have a bitter aftertaste.

name: Hot Juice
desc: Made from hot-hot fruit. Always stays hot, so it's good to carry in cold weather.

name: Steamed Bread
desc: Bread that's been steamed. Makes a good snack for kids.

name: Cheese Bread
desc: Steamed cheese bread. Moist and chewy, with a subtle scent of feet.

name: Meat Dumpling
desc: A type of dim sum. Has a lovely sweet flavor and soft texture.

name: Chinese Manju
desc: Soft bun filled with various ingredients and steamed.

name: Curry Manju
desc: A soft dumpling filled with spices.

name: Steamed Gyoza
desc: One of the common ways to cook potstickers. Juicy and savory.

name: Pound Cake
desc: Square-shaped sponge cake. Steaming it brings out the sweet deliciousness.

name: Chocolate Sponge
desc: Chocolate cake that's as light and soft as a cloud.

name: Flan
desc: A jiggly dessert with a smooth texture. Shake it a little and watch it dance!

name: Pumpkin Flan
desc: A flan with the sweet and savory flavor of pumpkin.

name: Dumplings
desc: Small rice cakes on skewers. Traditional dessert eaten during festivals.

name: Salad
desc: Assorted fresh vegetables. Both healthy and nutritious!

name: Sandwich
desc: Vegetables and other ingredients placed between two slices of bread. Easy to eat with one hand.

name: Fruit Sandwich
desc: Fruit placed between two slices of bread. Beloved by children...or so parents hope!

name: Pickled Turnip
desc: Turnip that's been pickled. Has a fresh taste and is sometimes eaten after meals.

name: Pickles
desc: Lightly pickled cucumber. Has a crunchy texture.

name: Bamboo Rice
desc: Rice mixed with bamboo shoots. A popular dish in spring, with a savory flavor.

name: Raisin Bread
desc: Bread with raisins in it. Soft, sweet and sour, all at once.

name: Ice Cream
desc: A dessert made by freezing milk. Melts in your mouth. If you eat it too fast, you'll regret it.

name: Relax Tea Leaves
desc: A medicinal herb made by mixing various plants. Make tea with it for greater effect.

name: Onigiri
desc: Rice formed into a triangular shape. Often called a "rice ball." Easy to eat on the go, making it a staple lunch item.

name: Bread
desc: A staple food for many. You can toast it, stuff it, stick things between it or eat it any other way you'd like.

name: Salmon Onigiri
desc: Onigiri with salmon inside. One of the most popular rice ball recipes.

name: Pickle Mix
desc: Made with spring and winter turnips. The red and white colors symbolize good luck. Often served at festivals.

name: Turnip Heaven
desc: Turnips from three corners of the globe, gathered together into a turnip paradise. Try to eat all three at once!

name: Rice
desc: A staple of the dining table. Plays well with other dishes, so it's used in a wide variety of recipes.

name: Chocolate
desc: Smooth and sweet, it's an absolute standard. Found in endless varieties.

name: Wine
desc: A type of alcohol made from grapes. Popular for its taste and mellowness.

name: Elli Leaves
desc: An exotic plant with a dark, blue flower. Beautiful!

name: Milk (S)
desc: A small portion of milk taken from a Buffamoo. High in calcium.

name: Milk (M)
desc: A medium portion of Milk taken from a Buffamoo. High in calcium.

name: Milk (L)
desc: A large amount of milk taken from a Buffamoo. High in calcium.

name: Egg (S)
desc: A small Cluckadoodle egg. Has a soft white shell.

name: Egg (M)
desc: A Cluckadoodle egg. Has a soft white shell.

name: Egg (L)
desc: A large Cluckadoodle egg. Has a soft white shell.

name: Mayonnaise
desc: A condiment made by processing eggs. Used in various recipes with vegetables and fish.

name: Cheese
desc: Made by processing milk. Has a distinctive flavor. You can eat it as it is, or use it in various recipes.

name: Yogurt
desc: Made by processing milk. It eases upset stomachs.

name: Honey
desc: Honey collected for a queen bee. Very nutritious and popular for its natural sweetness.

name: Flour
desc: Made by grinding wheat. A necessity in making dough, used in many recipes. Pretty amazing if you think about it.

name: Oil
desc: Often used in fried recipes to add flavor and prevent sticking. Careful, it's highly flammable.

name: Curry Powder
desc: Powder used to cook curry. Made by mixing various spices. Goes well with lots of stuff.

name: Rice Flour
desc: Powder used to make rice dumplings. Adds stickiness to the resulting dish.

name: Medicine Bread
desc: A magic bread that teaches you new recipes. You can learn one (simple) recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Medicine Bread+
desc: A nicely baked Medicine Bread. Teaches you a difficult recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Cooking Bread
desc: A nicely baked Cooking Bread. Teaches you a difficult recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Cooking Bread+
desc: A nicely baked Cooking Bread. Teaches you a difficult recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Weapon Bread
desc: A magic bread that teaches you new recipes. You can learn one (simple) recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Weapon Bread+
desc: A nicely baked Weapon Bread. Teaches you a difficult recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Accessory Bread
desc: A magic bread that teaches you new recipes. You can learn one (simple) recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Accessory Bread+
desc: A nicely baked Accessory Bread. Teaches you a difficult recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Farming Bread
desc: A magic bread that teaches you new recipes. You can learn one (simple) recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Farming Bread+
desc: A nicely baked Farming Bread. Teaches you a difficult recipe appropriate to your skill.

name: Broadsword
desc: A light, easy-to-use sword. Recommended for beginners. Some even use it for cooking.

name: Steel Sword
desc: A short sword forged from steel. Has a longer than average blade that gives you an extended reach.

name: Wind Sword
desc: A sword imbued with the magic power of wind. Each swing spawns a miniature gale.

name: Aqua Sword
desc: A sword imbued with the magic power of water. Its blade is always wet.

name: Defender
desc: A sword designed to be used with a shield. Raises resistance toward incoming attacks and knockouts.

name: Aerial Blade
desc: A sword imbued with the magic power of wind. Its magical power makes it lighter than other swords.

name: Burning Sword
desc: A sword with a fiery blade. One touch and you'll be burned.

name: Sakura
desc: A cursed red sword. Though it has a beautiful name, its edge is coated with poison.

name: Luck Blade
desc: A sword that brings fortune to its wielder. You should totally buy a lottery ticket!

name: Platinum Sword
desc: A sword made from fine platinum. Highly durable. Makes its bearer more popular just by havin- Hey, what are you doing later tonight?

name: Raventine
desc: A short sword with high heat. According to legend, it's said to have once turned a lake into a hot spring.

name: Icifier
desc: The chill from this sword freezes water in the air. Perfect for making shaved ice.

name: Soul Eater
desc: A magical sword that eats souls. It has the power to take away an enemy's life.

name: Smash Blade
desc: A sword designed to target a foe's vital points, no matter what style or form you use.

name: Dragon Slayer
desc: A sword in the shape of three dragon heads. The three often fight over who's the best.

name: Sunspot
desc: A sword as hot as the sun. Some say it's so hot that it turns everything it strikes to ash.

name: Star Saber
desc: A short sword with a swing as beautiful as a shooting star. Just swing it, and bam, you're a superstar!

name: Gaia Sword
desc: A sword imbued with the magic power of earth. Because it's made from very hard material, it won't chip easily.

name: Grantale
desc: A sword imbued with the magic power of earth. Very tough, and guaranteed not to break or your money back!

name: Chaos Blade
desc: Companion to the Chaos Shield. Chooses its bearer with its magical power.

name: Rune Blade
desc: A treasured sword with rune power. The light beaming from it casts no shadow.

name: Steel Sword+
desc: A strengthened version of the Steel Sword. Born anew with freshly-colored blades.

name: Platinum Sword+
desc: A strengthened version of the Platinum Sword. Radiates light from its upgraded platinum.

name: Cutlass
desc: An old sword that belonged to pirates. Sailors carry them as charms.

name: Back Scratcher
desc: A sword (?) used to scratch itchy backs. Maybe your foes will freak out when they see it?

name: Durendal
desc: A sword with a shining blade. You can attack your foes while they're captivated by its radiant beauty.

name: Gladius
desc: A short sword forged through years of disciplined smithing. Like, really sharp and stuff.

name: Gorgeous Sword
desc: A gorgeous and dazzling sword which shines with an elegance like that of freshly-fallen snow.

name: Spoon
desc: A magic sword that somehow makes people want to eat pudding.

name: Rune Legend
desc: Swordsmen call this a legendary short sword. The runes imbued on its blade shine majestically.

name: Snakesword
desc: A sword made by connecting small bits of metal into one whip-like blade. Long-ranged and hard to avoid.

name: Veggieblade
desc: A vegetable used as a sword. I wonder how much damage it can cause...

name: Invisiblade
desc: Can you see the true blade?

name: Plant Sword
desc: A sword made from a plant. The more passionately you tend it, the bigger it grows and the stronger it becomes.

name: Claymore
desc: A long sword that's easy to swing. Has a fun ring on it that you can play with. (But don't try it at home!)

name: Zweihaender
desc: A large two-handed sword. Not much else to say -- it's very straight-forward and to the point, if you know what I mean.

name: Flame Saber
desc: A sword imbued with the magic power of fire. A single swing will make you drip with sweat. Kind of icky to use, really.

name: Cyclone Blade
desc: A sword imbued with the magic power of wind. Its thin blade has small holes in it to allow for air to pass through.

name: Dancing Dicer
desc: A weapon brought from the Far East. With its sharp edges, you can sometimes cut down foes in a single blow.

name: Great Sword
desc: A long sword designed to never dull or need sharpening. Balanced and easy to hold.

name: Heaven Asunder
desc: A legendary sword with a sharp blade that can pierce clouds. High chance of knocking down foes in a single blow.

name: Grand Smasher
desc: A long sword with spiky edges. Imbued with earth power, its spikes are designed to look like mountains.

name: Blue-Eyed Blade
desc: Makes its bearer's eyes shine blue, and grants the power to see an opponent's skill. Increases critical hit chance.

name: Poison Blade
desc: A longsword with a poison-covered blade. So dangerous that even a small scratch can kill you.

name: Steel Slicer
desc: Supposedly can cut through anything -- thus the name.

name: Flamberge
desc: A sword with a uniquely shaped blade. So beautiful, it's often used in ceremonies.

name: Shine Blade
desc: A sword with a high-heat blade and an ice-cold tip. Even evil hearts are soothed by its shiny glow.

name: Earth Shade
desc: A sword blessed by mother nature. Has an interesting design that looks kind of like a fault line.

name: Bio Smasher
desc: A poisoned long sword with jagged edges. Designed to spread poison thoroughly.

name: Punisher
desc: A long sword with a wide blade. Hurts worse than an atomic wedgie.

name: Sea Cutter
desc: A sword that can supposedly divide the sea. Listen closely and you'll hear the sound of ocean waves.

name: Volcanon
desc: A sword imbued with fire. Beams out a strong light. So hot, it raises the room temperature by 10 degrees.

name: Snow Crown
desc: A long sword imbued with water power. When plunged into snow, not a single flake will melt.

name: Moon Shadow
desc: A weapon from the Far East. Appears as naught but a shadow under cover of night. Can take down foes in a single blow.

name: Force Element
desc: A lighted long sword. Contains strong elemental power, making it hard to use.

name: Zweihaender+
desc: Zweihaender strengthened with special power. Hurts worse than a wedgie.

name: Flamberge+
desc: Flamberge strengthened with magic power. Its thin blade makes it easy to use.

name: Katzbalger
desc: A smartly-designed sword with an aerodynamic shape that makes it easy to swing.

name: Big Knife
desc: A knife with a large blade. So large, in fact, that one cannot easily cut apples with it. Unless they're REALLY BIG.

name: Katana
desc: A weapon from the Far East. Beautiful, strong and sharp. In rare cases, you may knock down foes with a single blow.

name: Balmung
desc: A long sword with sleek lines. Though it's big, it's designed to be aerodynamic and easy to handle.

name: Psycho
desc: A uniquely-shaped long sword. Its three blades have assorted curses on them, inflicting numerous status ailments.

name: Dekash
desc: Smells like fish, so it tends to attract cats.

name: Braveheart
desc: A rare long sword with a glittering blade. Its bearer's courage gives it strength.

name: Belzebuth
desc: Short-ranged, but has magical power strong enough to steal an enemy's life. High chance of landing critical hits.

name: Daicone
desc: A daikon radish so large and strong that it became a viable weapon. It dreamed big.

name: Caliburn
desc: A legendary calorie-burning sword. Few believe it actually exists. But here it is!

name: Orochi
desc: A sword separated into several parts, making it easy to wrap around foes. Capable of hitting far away enemies.

name: Spear
desc: A very simple spear, good for beginners. So simple that it's often used as a skewer for food.

name: Lance
desc: Has a unique triangular shape. Said to have been used in a war fought by an ancient empire.

name: Needle Spear
desc: A spear with a long blade. Has many uses and a high rate of owner satisfaction. A+++ would wield again!

name: Halberd
desc: A spear used for various purposes -- though most involve stabbing and cutting, as you might imagine.

name: Water Spear
desc: A spear imbued with the magic power of water. It's always wet. Be careful not to let it slip out of your hands!

name: Blood Lance
desc: A cursed spear. Its two blades remind you of a warlock.

name: Wood Staff
desc: A hard, wooden club. It might hurt more to hit with it than to stab with it.

name: Poison Spear
desc: A poisoned spear. Has a wide blade, making it easy to spread poison.

name: Corsesca
desc: A spear with a wide blade. Its shape was decided after many experiments trying to forge a high-accuracy blade.

name: Silent Grave
desc: A spear with a removable knife-like blade at its tip. Has a sealing effect on enemies.

name: Flare Lance
desc: A spear that lets out high heat. The closer to the tip, the hotter it gets. Perhaps it can cure back pain.

name: Heavy Lance
desc: A lance designed with a focus on attack power only, to the detriment of everything else. Heavy and hard to wield.

name: Iceberg
desc: A spear imbued with water power. Designed to work even underwater. Stab the fish, and you won't need a rod!

name: Metus
desc: A spear shaped to dig holes. Those who are struck by it have little hope of survival, thanks to its hidden might.

name: Monk Staff
desc: A nicely decorated stick with adjustable length.

name: Overbreak
desc: A spear with a huge blade. Every swing makes the enemy flinch. Maybe swinging will be enough!

name: Brionac
desc: A spear so strong that it can penetrate anything. According to legend, it made a hole in the mountains with one stab!

name: Feather Lance
desc: A spear imbued with the magic power of wind. Lift it up to the sky and it will pierce the heavens.

name: Belvarose
desc: Spear with spikes at the end. Requires skill to use, but as you grow accustomed to it, you can easily land knockouts.

name: Bjor
desc: A spear drenched in all available poisons. Has various effects.

name: Gungnir
desc: A legendary spear that can blow away storms. Its wind speed is so fast, though, that the bearer is equally at risk.

name: Lance+
desc: Lance strengthened by magical power. From tip to handle, it sparkles gorgeously in gold.

name: Corsesca+
desc: Corsesca strengthened by magical power. At half its original weight, it's very easy to wield.

name: Trident
desc: A three-pronged spear. Some lose their memory in shock when stabbed with it.

name: Pitchfork
desc: Origin of kitchen forks. Bit big for cake, though. And spaghetti? Fahgeddabouddit!

name: Dragon's Fang
desc: A spear as sharp as a dragon fang. The blade vibrates faster as danger approaches.

name: Gae Bolg
desc: A fierce spear with a trident-like shape. Every stab hurts.

name: Magical Lance
desc: A lance with magical power so strong that its entire form changes color rapidly.

name: Safety Lance
desc: A lance with its tip covered in cotton and cloth. Still hurts, though. We can stab if we want to!

name: Legion
desc: A lance with blades orbiting it. Foes can try to dodge, but these phantom blades ensure they won't make it very far.

name: Poison Queen
desc: A lance drenched in poisons from around the world. Handle with care, or you, too, may be poisoned.

name: Pine Club
desc: A lance that resembles a pineapple. Its surface stings. The creator of this lance must have been very...unique.

name: Fivestaff
desc: A long-ranged lance that seems almost as if it were made of blades, from tip to handle. Can also be swung.

name: Battle Hammer
desc: A hammer well-suited to blowing foes away -- or at least knocking them out.

name: War Hammer
desc: A hammer much heavier than it looks. Be careful when swinging it -- it bites back!

name: Great Hammer
desc: A hammer designed to eliminate shock when used. Very nicely balanced.

name: Schnabel
desc: A hammer designed to be small and light. Has good overall balance.

name: Gigant Hammer
desc: A large hammer. Be careful not to hit yourself!

name: Mjolnir
desc: A hammer imbued with earth power. It's said to cause earthquakes if three of them hit the ground at once.

name: Spiked Hammer
desc: A hammer outfitted with spikes. Can easily score critical hits, hammer or no.

name: Flame Hammer
desc: A hammer with fire power on one side. The flame helps enhance its damage output.

name: Ice Hammer
desc: A hammer made of ice. Good for smashing things on a hot day. Refreshing!

name: Sky Hammer
desc: A hammer with wings. Very light and easy to use.

name: Graviton Hammer
desc: A hammer imbued with earth power. Designed not to hurt your hands during attack.

name: Bone Hammer
desc: A light but strong hammer made from bones.

name: Crystal Hammer
desc: A hammer imbued with water power. Its hard head and spikes cause major damage.

name: War Hammer+
desc: War Hammer imbued with magical power. Causes less strain on the back.

name: Gigant Hammer+
desc: Gigant Hammer imbued with magical power. Originally owned by high-ranking giants. Has engravings of their names.

name: Hammer
desc: Farming hammer given a quickie reforge for battle-readiness. Tougher than it looks.

name: Toy Hammer
desc: Anyone hit by this hammer must pretend that it really hurts. It's the law! Raises chance of knockouts.

name: Fatal Crush
desc: A hammer way beyond standard size. Long-ranged, and has a high chance of landing critical hits.

name: Strong Stone
desc: Large chunks of metal are connected to its head. High in attack due to its heavy weight.

name: Kongo
desc: Made by fusing together chunks of metal. Long-ranged, but hard to handle.

name: Bat
desc: A wooden bat used in baseball. Only kids in striped shirts make a weapon like this their first choice.

name: Iron Bat
desc: An iron bat used in baseball. Not designed as weaponry, but beggars can't be choosers... Maybe you'll hit a home run!

name: Splash Star
desc: Hammer made by using magical power. As its name implies, it looks like splashing stars.

name: Battle Axe
desc: An axe with a great deal of force behind it. Must be used carefully. Has a high chance of landing critical hits.

name: Pole Axe
desc: An axe with a crescent moon-shaped blade. Has a pointy end as well. Choppy-choppy OR stabby-stabby. You decide!

name: Alldale
desc: An axe with two golden blades. Called angel wings, they are both strong and beautiful.

name: Great Axe
desc: An axe with improved balance. Often thought of as a go-to axe when you're just not sure what weapon to use.

name: Demon Axe
desc: An axe possessed by an evil spirit ever since it cut down a cursed tree.

name: Crescent Axe
desc: An axe with a sleek edge. Its center is unbalanced, however, so it's hard to hold it straight.

name: Executioner
desc: An axe with a sketchy past. Was imbued with dark power while trying to raise its attack.

name: Heat Axe
desc: An axe with burning blades. Nicknamed 'Phoenix Feather,' it serves as a symbol of regeneration.

name: Frost Axe
desc: An axe with an icy cold blade. Freezes while it cuts, ensuring less pain for more humane murdering.

name: Tomahawk
desc: An axe with a single blade. The tassel on its edge is always blowing in the wind.

name: Rock Axe
desc: Has one of the hardest blades of any axe. As a result, it's also one of the heaviest axes around.

name: Double Edge
desc: A well-balanced axe with double blades. Highly regarded for its strength and ease of use.

name: Saint Axe
desc: A holy axe with sacred powers. Originally forged for use in rituals, not battle, making it a bit unwieldy.

name: Pole Axe+
desc: A pole axe strengthened with magical power. Easier to hold and has greater balance.

name: Crescent Axe+
desc: A crescent axe strengthened with magical power. A true masterpiece designed to be easy to wield.

name: Axe
desc: Originally a farming axe, it's excited to join you in battle. Its name is Meryl. And it likes you... for now.

name: Lollipop
desc: A sweet candy on a stick that's so hard, it just might work as a weapon. Raises chance of knockouts and cavities.

name: Battle Scythe
desc: An axe with an extremely sharp blade. Much bigger and sharper than a farming sickle.

name: Basilisk Fang
desc: A weapon that can cut through anything as if it were cloth. Has a paralyzing effect.

name: Devil Finger
desc: A weapon that leaves scars said to resemble scratches from the devil's nails. Has the power to absorb life.

name: Rod
desc: A staff with magical power. Designed for sorcery, so it reduces RP spent when using magic.

name: Staff
desc: A simple, magical staff. Try it out and see what you can do with it!

name: Silver Staff
desc: A staff made with sacred silver gems. Improves concentration, making it ideal for students.

name: Flare Staff
desc: A staff imbued with the magic power of fire. The head is very hot and tends to spark a lot. Hey, that rhymes!

name: Ice Staff
desc: A staff imbued with the magic power of water. The head is very cold and seems to emanate a faint breeze.

name: Lightning Wand
desc: A staff imbued with the magic power of wind. Said to bring thunder and lightning.

name: Earth Staff
desc: A staff imbued with the magic power of earth. Strong enough to shake the ground.

name: Wizard's Staff
desc: Proof that the bearer is a full-fledged wizard. You can feel your intelligence grow just by holding it.

name: Mage's Staff
desc: A staff that can be used as a walking stick. Popular among older wizards.

name: Rune Staff
desc: A staff used by great wizards. Its magical power can be boosted by writing runes in the air.

name: Mage's Staff+
desc: A mage's staff strengthened with magical power. Not only more powerful, but easier to use as well.

name: Magic Broom
desc: A staff that long ago belonged to a witch. You can use it to fly around in classic witchy style.

name: Basket
desc: A basket that fits more than you'd think. Be careful not to leave things inside when fighting or they might spill!

name: Magic Shot
desc: A trumpet-shaped syringe. Makes mysterious sloshy sounds. Getting pierced with it would hurt a lot.

name: Hell Branch
desc: A staff made from a netherworld branch. There's rumors that the kid who invented this was scolded by his parents.

name: Crimson Staff
desc: A blood-colored staff. And no, it wasn't painted with real blood. It's just dye made from insects.

name: Bubble Staff
desc: A staff that produces millions of bubbles. It must be popular among children. Don't be so mean. Lend it to them.

name: Gaia Rod
desc: A staff that has the power of the earth. It gets power from the Forest of Beginnings secretly.

name: Shooting Star Staff
desc: A staff inspired by speeding stars in the sky. Sadly, your speed will not become twice as fast.

name: Cyclone Rod
desc: A staff that has the power of wind. It produces high suction power which is used as a cleaning tool in another world.

name: Storm Wand
desc: A staff that is believed to be able to call storms. If it really does, it's gonna be a problem. Please don't try it.

name: Ruby Rod
desc: A passionate staff that shines bright red. No one can stop the feelings gushing out from this weapon.

name: Emerald Rod
desc: Bright green is a symbol of calmness. This rod makes you look intelligent and cool.

name: Sapphire Rod
desc: A very cute rod. This is the best for those who care about the beauty of their hair.

name: Amethyst Rod
desc: A staff decorated with purple amethysts. Many of the wizards who have this rod are attractive, mature people.

name: Aquamarine Rod
desc: A staff decorated with an ocean blue stone.

name: Diamond Rod
desc: Although it's the king of jewels, the only thing people care about is its hardness. And it IS very hard.

name: Friendly Rod
desc: A staff of friendship. "We should be good friends" means she doesn't want to date you.

name: Love-Love Rod
desc: A staff of love. Among wizard couples, it's secretly popular to equip it together.

name: Sorcerer's Wand
desc: An almighty staff. But a true sorcerer knows he actually knows nothing.

name: Hell Curse
desc: A staff that is believed to be created in a hellish pot. By the way, the udon cooked in that pot tastes amazing.

name: Algernon
desc: A staff of flowers given to someone. For some reason, handling it makes you feel extra sharp.

name: Golden Turnip Staff
desc: A staff in the shape of a Golden Turnip. When you drop it in the fountain, just be honest and say you dropped a gold staff.

name: Sweet Potato Staff
desc: One autumn day, someone poked a roasted sweet potato with a broom. That's how this staff was created.

name: Elvish Harp
desc: A beautiful and well-made harp. Created by famous Elvish craftsmen. You can play, sing, and hit enemies with it.

name: Syringe
desc: A staff that is a fusion of treatment and injury made by a mad magic doctor. Not recommended for hospitals.

name: Short Dagger
desc: Hold one in each hand to overwhelm your foes. If you do this, though, you can't bear a shield.

name: Steel Edge
desc: Weapon made with sharpened iron. Heavy, and requires considerable skill to wield.

name: Wind Edge
desc: Two roaring swords that create winds capable of slicing through enemies.

name: Frost Edge
desc: Two swords emanating cool air. Not for people who are overly sensitive to the cold.

name: Steel Katana
desc: Solid swords reinforced with high heat. So sharp that they can cut steel.

name: Sonic Dagger
desc: Slim wind-elemental dual blades that move at sonic speed. You can hear the air itself being cut in two.

name: Salamander
desc: Dual blades set ablaze. Be careful you don't get burned, 'cause these swords are hot, hot, hot!

name: Twin Blade
desc: Dual blades that can make you as strong as an ogre. The long blades help extend your reach. Also has a poisoning effect.

name: Rampage
desc: Called "Rampage" due to their fiery power and the violence they instill in their bearer.

name: Platinum Edge
desc: Dual blades made of pure platinum. Very sharp and durable.

name: Efreet
desc: High-heat dual blades that generate heat waves. Legend says they once caused an entire sea to evaporate.

name: Deep Blizzard
desc: Dual blades so cold that all water around them freezes on contact. As such, its blades tend to change shape a lot.

name: Dark Invitation
desc: Magical soul-eating swords. They can end the lives of their targets in a single instant.

name: Force Divide
desc: Dual blades imbued with both fire and water energies. The temperature difference increases the damage dealt.

name: Dragoon Claw
desc: Dual blades in the shape of three dragon heads. The three on the left blade stop the other three from fighting.

name: Heart Fire
desc: Dual blades as hot as the sun. Their fire is said to turn everything to ash.

name: Desert Wind
desc: Dual blade designs inspired by desert winds. Popular for their beauty and strength.

name: Broken Wall
desc: Dual blades imbued with earth power. So hard that they can smash rocks to pieces.

name: Orcus Sword
desc: These long blades allow for a number of attacks to be made from a distance.

name: Chaos Edge
desc: Dual blades imbued with magical power. Has a paralyzing effect.

name: Rune Edge
desc: Dual blade imbued with runic power. Those lucky enough to see them in action may have their dreams come true.

name: Iron Edge
desc: Reinforced dual blades. Heavy but well-balanced, making them easy to wield.

name: Emerald Edge
desc: Dual blades reinforced countless times. The increase to their magic power gives them a green tint.

name: Thief Knife
desc: Dual blades often used by pirates and thieves. Holding them somehow makes you feel more inherently aggressive.

name: Double Scratch
desc: Dual blades used to soothe itchy backs With two at your disposal, your whole back is covered!

name: Priest Saber
desc: Dual blades used by priests for protection. They're quite powerful, and guaranteed to keep anyone safely preaching.

name: Earnest Edge
desc: In the hands of an expert, these long blades can win a fight without taking a hit.

name: Gorgeous Lx
desc: Gorgeous dual blades. Not only one, but two of them. They're gorgeous, and you can be too, by wielding them.

name: Acutorimass
desc: Cooking ladles reinforced as weapons. For some reason there are two.

name: Twin Leeks
desc: Leeks. Yes, leeks. Wielding them makes you feel like singing polka.

name: Twin Justice
desc: Justice now comes in two. Twice the justice, twice the power. Mete it upon your foes for... Uh...great justice!

name: Leather Gloves
desc: They're for protecting your fists rather than attacking. Since there are holes for fingers, it's easy to grab monsters.

name: Brass Knuckles
desc: A lethal weapon mainly used by Goblin gangs.

name: Kote
desc: A weapon that can be used as armor.

name: Bear Claws
desc: A weapon that looks like the claws of a bear.

name: Fists of Fire
desc: Burning iron gauntlets. We all are friends after a fight!

name: Fists of Water
desc: Cold iron gauntlets. They can deliver merciless blows.

name: Fists of Wind
desc: Sharp iron gauntlets. It's important to draw your punches quickly for maximum effect.

name: Fists of the Earth
desc: Heavy iron gauntlets. They make you feel powerful and grounded.

name: Fists of Light
desc: Shiny iron gauntlets. So bright they make you want sunglasses.

name: Fists of Dark
desc: Evil iron gauntlets. This is the power gained by giving your heart to the dark side.

name: Gloves
desc: These are for protecting your fists. Pretty basic, really.

name: Cat Punch
desc: A weapon in the shape of a cat's paws. Although it looks soft, the claw part seriously hurts.

name: Dragon Claws
desc: A weapon made from dragon claws. Can even cut steel.

name: Animal Puppets
desc: A useful tool to have when performing a skit alone, but as a weapon...

name: Ironleaf Fists
desc: Hurts, of course. Be careful not to stab yourself instead.

name: Golem Punch
desc: Learning the way of Golems' punch. It's sad that they don't fly off.

name: Hand of God
desc: A.k.a. God hand.

name: Caestus
desc: It's said that ancient boxers used them.

name: Bazal Katar
desc: A foreign weapon that looks like a sword. Actually, it's called a jamadhar.

name: Fenrir
desc: A weapon in the shape of a wolf-like monster that can swallow gods.

name: Cheap Hoe
desc: An old, rusty hoe. You can till the fields with it. Its blade is chipped.

name: Sturdy Hoe
desc: A slightly stronger hoe. No longer chipped by rocks. Charge to cover a wider area.

name: Seasoned Hoe
desc: A stronger hoe. Covers an even wider area when charged than the Sturdy Hoe.

name: Shiny Hoe
desc: A hoe that glimmers like the sweat on your brow. Covers a very wide area when charged.

name: Blessed Hoe
desc: A hoe so strong that the soil is all like, thank you, may I have another? Really wide coverage when charged.

name: Cheap Waterpot
desc: An old, rusted waterpot. You can water the fields with it. Press the B Button repeatedly to water as you walk.

name: Tin Waterpot
desc: A tin waterpot. Though heavy, it can be charged to water the field.

name: Lion Waterpot
desc: A super-cool waterpot. So cool that it can cover wider areas than most.

name: Rainbow Waterpot
desc: A colorful waterpot. So colorful that it can cover wider areas than most. It wishes to be the prettiest waterpot at the dance.

name: Joy Waterpot
desc: A lovely waterpot. So lovely that its water strikes the field as if tears from an omnibenevolent deity above.

name: Cheap Sickle
desc: An old, rusty sickle. Use it to cut weeds and plants. You can also cut crops to collect seeds.

name: Iron Sickle
desc: A fairly sharp sickle. Use it to cut weeds and plants. You can also cut crops to collect seeds.

name: Quality Sickle
desc: A high-quality sickle. Use it to cut weeds and plants. You can also cut crops to collect seeds.

name: Super Sickle
desc: An outstanding sickle. Use it to cut weeds and plants. You can also cut crops to collect seeds.

name: Legendary Sickle
desc: This sickle is sick...le! Use it to cut weeds and plants. You can also cut crops to collect seeds.

name: Cheap Hammer
desc: An old, rusty hammer. Too old to be charged. Used to flatten soil.

name: Iron Hammer
desc: A hammer reinforced with bronze. Can be charged to cover wider areas. Used to flatten soil.

name: Silver Hammer
desc: A hammer reinforced with silver. Can be charged to cover wider areas. Used to flatten soil.

name: Golden Hammer
desc: A hammer reinforced with gold. Can be charged to cover wider areas. Used to flatten soil.

name: Platinum Hammer
desc: A hammer made from platinum. Shorter time needed to charge, making it highly efficient. Used to flatten soil.

name: Cheap Axe
desc: An old, rusty axe. Too old to be charged.

name: Chopping Axe
desc: A sturdy bronze axe. Can be charged to cover wider areas.

name: Lumber Axe
desc: A nice, strong silver axe. Can be charged to cover wider areas.

name: Mountain Axe
desc: An axe like an ox. Made from gold and can be charged to cover wider areas.

name: Miracle Axe
desc: An axe so amazing, poems are written of its noble deeds. Shorter time needed to charge, making it highly efficient.

name: Cheap Pole
desc: An old, rusty fishing pole. So old that it might break if the fish is too large.

name: Beginner's Pole
desc: A pole for beginners. Can be charged to attract fish from far away.

name: Skilled Pole
desc: A pole for novice fishers. Can be charged to attract fish from far away.

name: Famous Pole
desc: A pole for master fishers. Can be charged to attract fish from far away.

name: Sacred Pole
desc: A pole so strong that it'll never break. Can be charged to attract fish from far away.

name: Small Shield
desc: A small shield, easy to use. Low defense capability.

name: Iron Shield
desc: A simple shield made from iron. Wide, so it stops attacks fairly easily.

name: Round Shield
desc: A rounded shield. Used to fend off attacks rather than simply deflecting them.

name: Platinum Shield
desc: A durable shield made of pure platinum. Greatly resists critical hits.

name: Heavy Shield
desc: A shield made from layers of silver. Big and tough, it has a high chance of resisting critical hits.

name: Knight Shield
desc: Proof of bravery, only borne by a chosen few. Has a very high chance of resisting critical hits.

name: Rune Shield
desc: A shield made with runes. Not easily damaged, and blocks magic attacks. Halves light and darkness damage.

name: Magic Shield
desc: A shield that blocks magic attacks and seals. Best used together with a staff.

name: Prism Shield
desc: A shield that fends off magic attacks. Reduces damage by diffusing magical power. Blocks seals.

name: Element Shield
desc: A shield that raises defense against elemental attacks. Lighter than it looks and very easy to use.

name: Chaos Shield
desc: A shield that goes with the chaos blade. Highly resistant to poison, paralysis and seals.

name: Turtle Shield
desc: A shield made by combining turtle shells. Very heavy, and often used in training. Resists being blown away.

name: Bone Shield
desc: A shield that's both light and hard. Its featherweight nature makes it easy to handle.

name: Kite Shield
desc: A shield with high defensive power. Simply shaped, easy to use and highly resistant to knockouts.

name: Magical Shield
desc: High in magic defense and resists status ailments. The crystal in its center reduces magic attacks.

name: Monkey Plush
desc: A cute stuffed animal. Sold out in stores due to how terrifyingly cuddly it is.

name: Umbrella
desc: An expensive umbrella. Mainly meant for use as a parasol, but works against rain, too!

name: Magic Plant Shield
desc: A shield from a magic plant. The better you take care of it, the stronger it will be.

name: Aquamarine Ring
desc: A roughly cut stone makes this ring quite attractive.

name: Amethyst Ring
desc: The elegance of the amethyst brings a calmness to the atmosphere.

name: Emerald Ring
desc: The bright-shining emerald beautifully adorns your finger.

name: Sapphire Ring
desc: A ring with a beautifully shining inset sapphire.

name: Diamond Ring
desc: A glittering ring. Protects against sleepiness, fatigue, illness and HP absorption.

name: Ruby Ring
desc: A ring with a mysterious and alluring design.

name: Happy Ring
desc: A ring that brings you happiness. Increases your chance of finding items.

name: Cursed Ring
desc: A cursed ring with spikes that hurt your fingers.

name: Fire Ring
desc: A ring imbued with the magical power of fire. It blocks fire damage, but makes you vulnerable to water damage.

name: Wind Ring
desc: A ring imbued with the magical power of wind. It blocks wind damage, but makes you vulnerable to earth damage.

name: Water Ring
desc: A ring imbued with the magical power of water. It blocks water damage, but makes you vulnerable to fire damage.

name: Earth Ring
desc: A ring imbued with the magical power of earth. It blocks earth damage, but makes you vulnerable to wind damage.

name: Silver Ring
desc: Beloved for its simple design, but otherwise unremarkable.

name: Gold Ring
desc: Beloved for its simple design. More expensive than silver.

name: Platinum Ring
desc: Beloved for its simple design. This platinum type is rare and hard to find.

name: Critical Ring
desc: A ring that raises your chance of landing critical hits. Just by wearing it, you'll know right where to attack.

name: Silent Ring
desc: A ring that not only resists seals, but places them upon foes as well due to the medicines set into its trim.

name: Paralysis Ring
desc: A ring that not only resists paralysis, but inflicts it upon foes as well due to the medicines set into its trim.

name: Poison Ring
desc: A ring that not only resists poison, but inflicts it upon foes as well due to the medicines set into its trim.

name: Magic Ring
desc: A ring imbued with magical power. Speeds up the time needed to charge.

name: Cheap Bracelet
desc: An old, rusty bracelet. Slightly raises magic defense.

name: Bronze Bracelet
desc: A heavy, bronze bracelet. Raises magic defense for a little bit.

name: Silver Bracelet
desc: A silver bracelet. Raises magic defense.

name: Gold Bracelet
desc: A golden bracelet. Raises magic defense quite considerably.

name: Platinum Bracelet
desc: A platinum bracelet. Greatly raises magic defense.

name: Aquamarine Brooch
desc: A brooch in the color of the deepest sea.

name: Amethyst Brooch
desc: A brooch with a strangely soothing effect.

name: Emerald Brooch
desc: A beautiful emerald brooch with an airy sheen to it.

name: Sapphire Brooch
desc: A lovely pink-colored sapphire brooch with a shell motif.

name: Diamond Brooch
desc: A golden brooch with scattered diamonds. Enjoy its smooth lines and beautiful glimmer. Resists all status ailments.

name: Ruby Brooch
desc: A brooch shining with ruby-red light. When put under the sun, it glitters like a star.

name: Silver Pendant
desc: A silver pendant. Simple but elegant in design.

name: Heart Pendant
desc: A cute heart-shaped pendant. Warms your heart and increases skill experience gained.

name: Star Pendant
desc: A star-shaped pendant that shines as bright as a real heavenly body. Increases experience gain.

name: Sun Pendant
desc: A sun-shaped pendant. Increases companions' abilities with its light.

name: Field Pendant
desc: A pendant inspired by the wind. Its scent increases the ability of friendly monsters.

name: Dew Pendant
desc: An outdoorsy pendant inspired by dew. Raises attack for farm tools.

name: Earth Pendant
desc: A pendant inspired by earth. Its bounty boosts the effects of recovery items.

name: Holy Amulet
desc: A charm that is said to protect one from danger.

name: Charm
desc: A charm from the Far East. Protects you from misfortune by blocking critical hits.

name: Leather Belt
desc: An ordinary leather belt of the sort one can find almost anywhere. Raises defensive skills.

name: Lucky Strike
desc: Brings you good luck. Grants a higher than average chance of landing critical hits.

name: Talisman
desc: A type of protective charm. Reverses status effects such as poison, paralysis, fatigue and cold.

name: Champ Belt
desc: An honorary belt given to champions. Greatly increases maximum HP.

name: Gloves
desc: Fine quality leather gloves. Their soft green color is attractive to girls.

name: Work Gloves
desc: Protects your hands from blisters. A must-have for farming.

name: Badge
desc: A vintage, collectible badge given out as a consolation prize.

name: Power Gloves
desc: Gloves that fit snugly on one's hands. Used to carry heavy things. They're so bad!

name: Magic Charm
desc: A must-have charm among magic knights. Favors either attack or magic attack -- whichever is stronger.

name: Shield Ring
desc: A ring used as a shield. Though tough, it only covers a short range. Occasionally reduces damage received to 1.

name: Rosary
desc: An accessory bearing a holy cross, used for prayers. Prevents most monsters from appearing at all.

name: Courage Badge
desc: Given to those of brave heart and courageous mind. Ain't it the truth!

name: Hero's Proof
desc: Proof of almighty power. Slowly recovers HP.

name: Proof of Wisdom
desc: Proof of almighty wisdom. Slowly recovers RP.

name: Hand-Knit Scarf
desc: A warm, woolen scarf. Halves RP consumption (with some exceptions).

name: Fluffy Scarf
desc: A scarf made of soft cotton. Very warm. Cuts all RP consumption (with some exceptions).

name: Art of Attack
desc: A book on the secrets of combat. Generates sonic waves and expands your weapon's target area.

name: Art of Defense
desc: A book on the secrets of guarding. Halves time spent flinching, granting its reader a heart of steel.

name: Art of Magic
desc: A book on the secrets of spellcasting. Halves non-elemental attacks by way of magic walls.

name: Earrings
desc: Dangly earrings. They're so cute when they bobble in the breeze.

name: Witch Earrings
desc: Small, jaggy earrings. Coordinate nicely with a broomstick and pointy hat.

name: Magic Earrings
desc: Earrings made from dazzling magic stones. Makes even the ugliest of earlobes look nice.

name: Venti's Charm
desc: A charm given by Ventuswill. According to her, it's quite lucky.

name: Venti's Charm
desc: A charm given by Ventuswill. According to her, it's quite lucky.

name: Anette's Necklace
desc: With wearing this necklace, you can move faster. Also, you're kicking up more clouds of dirt. Stop that.

name: Throwing Ring
desc: You can throw an item far away with this ring.

name: Stay-up Ring
desc: You will no longer yawn with this ring. Hail to short sleepers!

name: Strange Pendant
desc: This creepy-looking pendant nullifies your defense and magic defense. So, uh, good luck with that.

name: Dolphin Brooch
desc: A lovely brooch made by a master craftsman. If one of your family equips it, it enhances their status.

name: Engagement Ring
desc: Use it to propose to your #1 love. Be sure you also prepare a double bed! Well...after they say yes, anyway.

name: Silver Hairpin
desc: A traditional craft item from the Far East. Worn on the head to ward off evil spirits.

name: Gold Hairpin
desc: A traditional craft item from the Far East. Made of finest gold.

name: Fancy Hat
desc: A striking red hat. Breathes quite well, offering superior cranial comfort.

name: Headband
desc: A headband from the Far East. Tie it around your forehead when you want to feel awesome.

name: Feathered Hat
desc: A hat with feathers in it. Protects your head and makes you look like an intellectual. Also increases love.

name: Brand Glasses
desc: A famous designer's brand. Makes you look stylish!

name: Spectacles
desc: People say you look smart with these.

name: Intelligent Glasses
desc: You look rather more silly than smart in these.

name: Straw Hat
desc: A hat great for summer. It feels good because it lets the heat out.

name: Fireproof Hood
desc: Protects your head. Don't push. Don't run. Don't talk. Just stop, drop...and rooooooll...

name: Cute Knitting
desc: A warm, woolen hat.

name: Black Ribbon
desc: A black-colored ribbon. Those who wear it look intimidating.

name: Orange Ribbon
desc: An orange-colored ribbon. Those who wear it look fun to hang out with.

name: Red Ribbon
desc: A red-colored ribbon. Those who wear it look passionate.

name: Yellow Ribbon
desc: A yellow-colored ribbon. Those who wear it look intelligent.

name: Blue Ribbon
desc: A blue-colored ribbon. Those who wear it look loyal.

name: Green Ribbon
desc: A green-colored ribbon. Those who wear it look environmentally conscious. Possibly hipster.

name: Purple Ribbon
desc: A purple-colored ribbon. Those who wear it look sort of gothic.

name: Indigo Ribbon
desc: An indigo-colored ribbon. Those who wear it look regal.

name: White Ribbon
desc: A white-colored ribbon. Those who wear it should probably avoid eating spaghetti.

name: Turnip Headgear
desc: A hat made from a turnip. It was once used during Halloween, but it got replaced by a pumpkin.

name: Pumpkin Headgear
desc: A hat made from a pumpkin. The hero of Halloween.

name: Spring Headdress
desc: A headdress that makes you feel spring-y. People who love spring have pure hearts.

name: Summer Headdress
desc: A headdress that makes you feel summer-y. People who love summer have strong hearts.

name: Autumn Headdress
desc: A headdress that makes you feel autumn-y. People who love autumn have merciful hearts.

name: Winter Headdress
desc: A headdress that makes you feel winter-y. People who love winter have open hearts.

name: Lolita Headdress
desc: Gothic Lolita fashion that is popular among some people.

name: Headdress
desc: An accessory that decorates your head. It must be frilly and flashy.

name: Cat Ears
desc: An accessory inspired by a Palm Cat's ears.

name: Crown
desc: A classy crown that kings wear.

name: Four Seasons
desc: A headdress that makes you feel all seasons. It's for those who have pure, strong, merciful and open hearts.

name: Silk Hat
desc: When you wear this, you might hear a song. No tricks, no gimmicks!

name: Feather Boots
desc: Boots made of a light material. Makes you feel like you're walking on air!

name: Heavy Boots
desc: Boots made of steel. Keep you from blowing away, but you'll get tired more easily.

name: Leather Boots
desc: Leather boots made for travelers. Tough and durable.

name: Knight Boots
desc: Boots with very high defense. Fine quality. Often worn by knights.

name: Snow Boots
desc: Special boots originally created for wear in snowy regions. They stop you from slipping in any weather!

name: Ice Skates
desc: Boots that make you skate around like you're in a rink, anywhere you go. They don't let you jump or spin, though.

name: Piyo Sandals
desc: Shoes that chirp with every step. They make you want to run around just to see how loud they can get.

name: Step-In Boots
desc: Boots designed to prevent you from executing dash attacks.

name: Ghost Boots
desc: Boots designed to lessen one's weight through principles learned from flying foes. Increases travel speed.

name: Iron Geta
desc: Simple iron footwear. Made for training purposes. Decreases travel speed.

name: Strider Boots
desc: Boots that help you take bigger steps. Lengthens your invincibility when dashing.

name: Secret Shoes
desc: Boots with secret heels that make you look taller.

name: Wet Boots
desc: Boots that are wet and slippery. Their natural power helps you land critical hits.

name: Sneaking Boots
desc: Boots used to sneak up on unsuspecting foes unnoticed. Allows you to attack monsters before they attack you!

name: Fast Step Boots
desc: Boots designed for dance practice. Puts a spring in their wearer's step.

name: Water Shoes
desc: Footwear used by Ninja of the Far East. Helps you walk on water.

name: Rocket Wing
desc: Boots that help you walk faster than ever before. Takes your breath away, so make sure not to pass out!

name: Silver Boots
desc: Simple silver boots. Wearing them increases defense.

name: Gold Boots
desc: Simple golden boots. Wearing them increases defense.

name: Bone Boots
desc: Boots made with a combination of hard bones. Though they may look primitive, they're high in defense.

name: Fairy Boots
desc: Rare boots made with fairy dust. Very light, but "fairy" tough.

name: Free Farming Shoes
desc: Shoes for advanced farmers that make it possible to cultivate regardless of the grid lines.

name: Shirt
desc: A plain shirt to wear under clothes. It's made from materials which absorb sweat well.

name: Vest
desc: Fancy clothing that keeps you warm. Also called a waistcoat.

name: Wooly Shirt
desc: The puffy wool protects you from attacks, but it's soooooo annoying to wash.

name: Mercenary's Cloak
desc: Makes you look super cool.

name: Mail
desc: You've got mail!

name: Cotton Cloth
desc: Might look like bandages, but they're not. Also not recommended as a chest wrap for women.

name: Chain Mail
desc: With this, straw sandals and a ninja sword on your back, you're on your way to becoming a true warrior!

name: Scale Vest
desc: A vest studded with scales.

name: Protector
desc: Equipment that prevents accidents before they happen.

name: Wind Cloak
desc: A cloak imbued with the element of wind. Don't get any bright ideas and start jumping off of buildings, though.

name: Sparkling Shirt
desc: This is the biggest challenge for people who love clothes. Wearing something like this... Are you out of mind?

name: Platinum Mail
desc: A luxurious mail made of platinum.

name: Lamellar Vest
desc: Armor made from plate-shaped scales. It doesn't impede your speed and also protects you well.

name: Elvish Cloak
desc: A brilliant cloak that is absolutely perfect. Only the beautiful can wear this.

name: Power Protector
desc: A reinforced protector. It will prevent any accidents. Disclaimer: Not to be used when cooking.

name: Dragon Cloak
desc: A cloak with the symbol of a dragon. Anything with dragons on it is strong, right?

name: Rune Vest
desc: A vest imbued with the power of runes.

name: Royal Garter
desc: Makes you feel the dignity of a king.

name: Four Dragons' Vest
desc: A vest blessed by Native Dragons. Can tolerate any attack.

name: Brush
desc: An item used to brush monsters. Capable of grooming just about anything!

name: Clippers
desc: An item used to trim and clip Wooly fur. Designed not to hurt its target.

name: Magnifying Glass
desc: An item used to check soil quality. Equip and examine fields to learn more about your crops.

name: Turnip Seeds
desc: Grows well from summer to fall. Recommended for beginners. Most common crop in the game, for some reason.

name: Potato Seeds
desc: Grows well from spring to summer, but not in winter. Grows beautiful flowers.

name: Cucumber Seeds
desc: Grows well from spring to summer, but not in winter. Hearty ones may grow again after harvesting.

name: Strawberry Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring and fall. Bears sweet fruits. Hearty ones may grow again after harvesting.

name: Cabbage Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring and fall. Grows fast, and rarely withers.

name: Moondrop Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring and fall, but not in winter. An easy flower to grow.

name: Toyherb Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring but not in winter. A fast grower, but delicate and tough to harvest. Cures fatigue if fully grown.

name: Tomato Seeds
desc: Grows well from spring to summer, but not in winter. Grows nutritious tomatoes. May grow again after harvesting.

name: Corn Seeds
desc: Grows well from spring to summer, but not in winter. Improves the soil if you till it without harvesting.

name: Onion Seeds
desc: Grows well in fall. Easy to harvest and easy on the soil.

name: Pumpkin Seeds
desc: Grows well from spring to summer, but not in winter. Easy on the soil. May grow again after harvesting.

name: Pineapple Seeds
desc: Grows well in summer, but not in other seasons. Takes time to grow. May grow again after harvesting, but tough on soil.

name: Pink Cat Seeds
desc: Grows well in summer, but not in winter. Grows fast, is easy to harvest, but withers fast.

name: Eggplant Seeds
desc: Grows well from spring to summer, but not in winter. Hearty ones may grow again after harvesting.

name: Carrot Seeds
desc: Grows well in fall. A well-balanced crop that's easy on the soil.

name: Yam Seeds
desc: Grows well from summer to fall, but not in winter. Easy on the soil.

name: Spinach Seeds
desc: Grows well in fall. Grows fast, but withers quickly. Don't forget to water it every day!

name: Green Pepper Seeds
desc: Grows well in summer, but not in winter. Highly nutritious. Hearty ones may grow again after harvesting.

name: Charm Blue Seeds
desc: Grows well in fall, but not in winter. Easy to grow, with a good balance of growth rate and resilience.

name: Fodder Seeds
desc: Grow feed for the monsters. Hearty ones may grow again after harvesting.

name: Cherry Grass Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring, but not in winter. Grows a light pink flower.

name: Lamp Grass Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter. Takes a long time to grow. Mainly used as an ingredient in medicines.

name: Blue Crystal Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring, but not in other seasons. Takes a long time to grow. Its seed resembles blue crystal.

name: Emery Flower Seeds
desc: Takes a very long time to grow. Rarely withers, and can be cultivated by almost anyone.

name: Ironleaf Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter, but not in summer. Takes a long time to grow. Has a special power to gather iron from the soil.

name: Clover Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring and fall, but not in summer. A lucky seed that brings good fortune, but withers very easily.

name: Fireflower Seeds
desc: Grows well in summer, but not in winter. Its seeds are as black as gunpowder.

name: Green Crystal Seeds
desc: Grows well in summer, but not in other seasons. Takes a long time to grow. Its seed resembles green crystal.

name: Noel Grass Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter, but not in summer. Takes a long time to grow but rarely withers. Used in certain festivals.

name: Autumn Grass Seeds
desc: Grows well in fall, but not in winter. Takes a long time to grow. Its seed is red and round.

name: Pom-Pom Grass Sds.
desc: Grows well in fall, but not in winter. Takes a long time to grow. Its seed is white and soft.

name: Red Crystal Seeds
desc: Grows well in fall, but not in other seasons. Takes a long time to grow. Its seed resembles red crystal.

name: White Crystal Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter, but not in other seasons. Takes a long time to grow. Its seed resembles white crystal.

name: Pink Turnip Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring, but not in winter. Grows a beautiful pink turnip. Easy to harvest. Popular with novice farmers.

name: Radish Seeds
desc: Grows well in fall, but not in summer. Has a good balance of growth rate and resilience. Easy on the soil.

name: Leek Seeds
desc: Grows well in spring and fall, but not in summer. Withers fairly easily, but is easy on the soil.

name: Bok Choy Seeds
desc: Grows well in fall, but not in summer. Weak to heat.

name: Gold Cabbage Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter, but not in summer. Grows into a gorgeous golden cabbage.

name: Gold Pumpkin Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter, but not in summer. Grows into a gorgeous golden pumpkin. May grow again after harvesting.

name: Gold Potato Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter, but not in summer. Grows into a gorgeous golden potato.

name: Gold Turnip Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter, but not in summer. Grows into a gorgeous golden turnip.

name: Gold Melon Seeds
desc: Grows well from spring to summer, but not in winter. Cultivated by a cute girl. May grow again after harvesting.

name: Hot-Hot Seeds
desc: Grows well in winter, but not in summer. Takes some time to grow, but is easy to harvest and doesn't wither easily.

name: Apple Tree Seeds
desc: Doesn't grow well in winter. Once it grows into a tree, it will produce apples every day.

name: Orange Tree Seed
desc: Doesn't grow well in winter. Once it grows into a tree, it will produce oranges every day.

name: Grape Tree Seed
desc: Doesn't grow well in winter. Once it grows into a tree, it will produce grapes every day.

name: Shining Seed
desc: Doesn't grow well in winter. Produces a lot of lumber. May produce ore.

name: Dungeon Seed
desc: Grows to a dungeon. Depending on the level of the seed, it may bloom into a particularly difficult one.

name: Sword Seed
desc: Grows into a sword. Neat, huh?

name: Shield Seed
desc: Grows into a shield. Cool, right?

name: Wettable Powder
desc: Sprinkle on soil to make plants stronger against typhoons and snowstorms.

name: Greenifier
desc: An item used to raise soil quality. Improves soil's ability to grow higher-level crops.

name: Greenifier+
desc: An item used to raise soil quality. Improves soil's ability to grow higher-level crops.

name: Formula A
desc: Sprinkle on soil to grow crops faster. It's somewhat effective.

name: Formula B
desc: Sprinkle on soil to grow crops faster. It's pretty effective.

name: Formula C
desc: Sprinkle on soil to grow crops faster. It's super effective!

name: No Rot
desc: Sprinkle on soil to prevent plants from wilting.

name: No Rot
desc: Sprinkle on soil to prevent plants from wilting. It's more effective than the  version.

name: Giantizer
desc: Sprinkle on soil to grow gargantuan produce.

name: Minimizer
desc: Sprinkle on soil to grow smaller plants. Also makes soil healthier.

name: Fodder
desc: Feed for monsters. Nutritious and sweet. Generally well-liked.

name: Fur (S)
desc: Wooly's fur. Used as yarn.

name: Fur (M)
desc: Wooly's fur. Used as yarn.

name: Fur (L)
desc: Wooly's fur. Used as yarn.

name: Yarn
desc: A large ball of yarn.

name: Scrap Metal
desc: Has limited use, and thus sees limited shipments.

name: Iron
desc: A type of mineral used in the forging of items and accessories. Found everywhere.

name: Bronze
desc: A type of mineral used in the forging of items and accessories. Pretty common.

name: Silver
desc: A type of mineral used in the forging of items and accessories. Valuable and highly sought after.

name: Gold
desc: A type of mineral used in the forging of items and accessories. Valuable and highly sought after.

name: Platinum
desc: A type of mineral used in the forging of items and accessories. Extremely rare and hard to find.

name: Orichalcum
desc: A legendary ore used for making weapons or accessories.

name: Diamond
desc: A very hard gem known as the 'King of Gemstones.' Symbolizes purity.

name: Ruby
desc: A red-colored gem symbolizing passion. Those that cast star-shaped reflections are particularly valuable.

name: Emerald
desc: A beautiful green-colored gem symbolizing happiness. Those that are clear and smooth are the most valuable.

name: Sapphire
desc: A gem that comes in different colors such as pink, blue, yellow and green. Symbolizes love.

name: Amethyst
desc: A gem long known for its mysterious energy. Symbolizes peace of mind.

name: Aquamarine
desc: A gem as blue as the deep sea. Symbolizes calmness.

name: Cheap Cloth
desc: A poor-quality swatch of cloth. Unstitches when you so much as breathe on it.

name: Quality Cloth
desc: A cloth of fine quality. Its fabric is tough and not easily torn.

name: Silk Cloth
desc: A smooth, silky cloth. Go ahead and rub your face in it. Doesn't that feel nice?

name: Arrowhead
desc: Rusty and useless as-is, but might shine if polished. Kind of like humanity...

name: Warrior's Proof
desc: A proof handed down among the warrior tribes. Awarded by chiefs when a warrior attains manhood.

name: Glue
desc: An adhesive made from boiled animal skin. Teacher will get mad if she catches you eating it.

name: Old Bandage
desc: Tattered bandage that's basically falling apart. Kind of grody.

name: Gunpowder
desc: Gunpowder for fire arrows. Explosive and dangerous. Handle with care.

name: Earth Crystal
desc: Crystallized earth magic. Hard as a rock. Harder, actually!

name: Devil Horn
desc: A horn of a demon. Filled with magical power.

name: Devil Blood
desc: Life's blood collected from demons. Valued as medicine.

name: Magic Powder
desc: Magically-infused powder. Water-soluble and has many uses.

name: Magic Crystal
desc: Crystallized magic. Often dissolved before use.

name: Shoulder Piece
desc: Rough, wooden shoulder piece. Not terribly exciting.

name: Giant's Nail
desc: A giant fingernail. Gross!

name: Giant's Gloves
desc: Gloves worn by giants. Tough material that doesn't tear easily.

name: Hammer Piece
desc: A piece of broken hammer. Gotta be useful for something, right?

name: Insect Carapace
desc: The carapace of an insect. Light but tough.

name: Insect Jaw
desc: A monster jaw strong enough to chew through just about anything.

name: Spider's Thread
desc: An elastic string that's hard to break. Comes from a spider's butt.

name: Pretty Thread
desc: A shiny thread commonly used to make fabric. Comes from a spider's butt.

name: Pretty Carapace
desc: The carapace of an insect. Dappled and beautiful.

name: Rigid Horn
desc: A jagged and dappled horn. Looks dangerous.

name: Scorpion Tail
desc: A highly poisonous scorpion tail. Handle with care!

name: Scorpion Pincer
desc: Pincers that can easily cut through branches. They hurt, like, sooo much.

name: Panther Claw
desc: Razor-sharp claw, stronger than steel.

name: Dragon Fang
desc: A hard fang strong enough to leave tooth marks on iron.

name: Wolf Fang
desc: A sharp fang that can instantly kill prey with a single bite.

name: Quality Fur
desc: Warm, soft and shiny fur. Raises resistance to knockouts when used in upgrades.

name: Bull's Horn
desc: A sharp and dangerous horn. Worth a lot if its unscratched.

name: Bird's Feather
desc: A soft feather that's prickly at the base and pointy on one end.

name: Wind Crystal
desc: Crystallized wind magic. Constantly cushioned in fierce, ravaging winds.

name: Fur
desc: Stiffly textured fur. Slightly matted.

name: Root
desc: Tree root used in crafting. Can be used in weapons or ground into medicine.

name: Spore
desc: A mushroom spore. Could it be an ancient menace from outer space?!

name: Poison Powder
desc: Poisonous powder used to add poison to weapons and equipment. Leon might like it. Weirdo.

name: Plant Stem
desc: Strong and thick plant stem used for various purposes.

name: Strong Vine
desc: A long, thin, strong vine. Can be wrapped and banded.

name: Fish Fossil
desc: An ancient fish fossil. Some collectors would kill to find one!

name: Water Crystal
desc: Crystallized water magic. Easily broken, so must be handled with care.

name: Turtle Shell
desc: A hard turtle shell. Good when you want to make something hard. (Hey, get your mind out of the gutter!)

name: Fire Crystal
desc: Crystallized fire magic. Extremely hot. Must not be touched with bare hands.

name: Ghost Hood
desc: A hood that covers the head. Special material with spooky powers.

name: Skull
desc: A creepy skull. Some people love this kind of stuff, though.

name: Broken Hilt
desc: A broken piece of hilt. Fits nicely in the hand.

name: Broken Box
desc: An old wooden box. Get inside and pretend it's a spaceship!

name: Fairy Dust
desc: Fairy dust that sparkles at night.

name: Small Crystal
desc: Runes that have crystallized over the years. Very rare.

name: Wooly Furball
desc: Fur dropped by a Wooly. Inconceivably soft.

name: Light Crystal
desc: Crystallized light magic. Naturally luminous.

name: Dark Crystal
desc: Crystallized darkness magic. Turns everything light to dark.

name: Love Crystal
desc: Crystallized love that brings happiness. Generously lets you take your foes' HP when you attack.

name: Raccoon Leaf
desc: A magical leaf used by wily raccoons. Very handy tool that aids in transformation. Improves a weapon's range.

name: Dragon Bones
desc: Ancient dragon bones. Old, but still quite tough. Used for numerous purposes.

name: Red Lion Fur
desc: Beautiful red lion fur. The burning red color symbolizes strength.

name: Blue Lion Fur
desc: Beautiful blue lion fur. The sparkling coat and dark blue hue symbolize wisdom.

name: Broken Ice Wall
desc: A piece of Death Wall that's still conscious. Might try to creep up on you sometimes.

name: Ammonite
desc: Octopirate's ancient friend. Used to endure hardships, but not resistant to magic.

name: Icy Nose
desc: A sculpture in the shape of a Crystal Mammoth's trunk. Mammoths love to carry it around.

name: Chest Hair
desc: A Greater Demon's wild chest hair. So masculine!

name: Chimera Tail
desc: A Chimera's snake-like tail. Has a mind of its own.

name: Grimoire Scale
desc: A scale of the legendary Grimoire. Nobody has ever possessed one. Until now!

name: Legendary Scale
desc: A scale from a legendary fish in the lake. Greatly absorbs HP when used in upgrades.

name: Dragon Fin
desc: The fin of a legendary dragon. A perfect material that's hard, supple and lightweight.

name: Moving Branch
desc: A creepy branch that twitches. Strong in vitality, cutting it only makes it grow.

name: Electro Crystal
desc: An electrified crystal found within a Bane Dragon. Don't hold it with your bare hands!

name: Melody Bottle
desc: A small bottle that contains a Siren's voice. Sings an intoxicating melody if opened.

name: Golem Tablet
desc: A tablet that was once part of a Golem's body. It has '_METH' written on it, and serves as a source of power.

name: Earthwyrm Scale
desc: A scale from a legendary earth dragon. Incredibly hard and unable to be scratched.

name: Firewyrm Scale
desc: A scale from a legendary fire dragon. Strong enough to endure even volcanic eruptions.

name: Ambrosia's Thorns
desc: Thorns that protect Ambrosia's chrysalis. All beautiful roses have sharp thorns.

name: Lightning Mane
desc: A mane crackling with electricity. It'll shock you if you touch it.

name: Cursed Doll
desc: It's scary. Very scary. By the way, who's standing behind you?

name: Puppetry Strings
desc: Strings that were controlling Marionetta. Not the thread of a spider you saved.

name: Left Rock Shard
desc: A shard that Sano gave you as a favor. You didn't take it away by force, right?!

name: Right Rock Shard
desc: A shard that Uno gave you as a favor. You didn't take it away by force, right?!

name: Crystal Skull
desc: A crystal in the shape of a skull. Those who love jewels and hate ghosts will be upset by this.

name: Throne of the Empire
desc: A picture of the emperor. It goes for a high price in the Sechs Empire.

name: Wind Dragon Tooth
desc: According to Venti, she can grow new teeth by using her magic power, but since it's tiring, she hates to do it.

name: Rune Sphere Shard
desc: A shard made from an enormous amount of crystallized runes. Although just a piece, it has a lot of power.

name: Rafflesia Petal
desc: A petal from a rafflesia. It makes a really fancy fan.

name: MTGU Plate
desc: A plate created through science. "MTGU" stands for Miserable Trash Garbage Useless. See? Even the name is poorly designed.

name: Cheap Propeller
desc: A cheap-looking propeller used as a weapon. Being poor is not sad, but this is sad.

name: Quality Propeller
desc: A well-made propeller used as a weapon. It's obvious that the company had a lot of assets when they made this.

name: Rusty Screw
desc: A screw from something.

name: Shiny Screw
desc: A screw from something. People get upset if they find a screw left after making something.

name: Palm Claw
desc: It's sharp. Also, it hurts.

name: Malm Claw
desc: It's sharp. It hurts. Also, it's blue.

name: Big Crystal
desc: A big crystal made of something that's been mixed together. It is said that it's made up of people's thoughts.

name: Rune Crystal
desc: Runes that crystalized naturally. Feels warm somehow.

name: Green Core
desc: A green crystal with magic power. Makes you more kindly for some reason.

name: Red Core
desc: A red crystal overflowing with magic power. Makes you energetic.

name: Yellow Core
desc: A yellow crystal suffused with magic power. Makes you feel cheerful.

name: Blue Core
desc: A blue crystal that has magic power. Makes you feel calm.

name: Water Dragon Ash
desc: A mockery of a Water Dragon ended up like this.

name: Fire Dragon Ash
desc: A mockery of a Fire Dragon ended up like this.

name: Earth Dragon Ash
desc: A mockery of an Earth Dragon ended up like this.

name: Holy Spore
desc: A spore that is very rare. It is said the spore goes to Gandhara when it disperses.

name: White Stone
desc: There's a legend that women who were asked to marry while being presented with this stone lived happily ever after.

name: Invisible Stone
desc: A stone that is invisible. Difficult to find for obvious reasons. It's classified as a monster in a country to the east.

name: Shade Stone
desc: A rare stone that absorbs all surrounding light. Often used to blot out the world when darkness is preferred.

name: Double Steel
desc: Special steel that doubles the effect of the material used to previously reinforce an item.

name: 10-Fold Steel
desc: The rarest steel among Double Steels. Multiplies the effect of the material used to previously reinforce an item.

name: Round Stone
desc: Turned round after years of polishing under a waterfall.

name: Glitta Augite
desc: A strange stone produced by a tree. Emits strong light. If used for reinforcing a weapon, extends the range.

name: Light Ore
desc: A highly rare ore that can be used to change a weapon's category.

name: Scrap Metal+
desc: A super-duper awesomely spectacular piece of scrap metal that's super-duper useless to most people.

name: Stick
desc: A thin stick that can be used for materials. You could poke things with it too, I guess.

name: Quality Puffy Fur
desc: Really puffy fur. Like, the puffiest of puff. It's really puffy for sure!

name: Yellow Down
desc: Soft, feathery duck down. Looks outstanding.

name: Penguin Down
desc: Down from an emperor penguin. "Emperor" is not their title, but their name.

name: Ivory Tusk
desc: The discarded tusk of an elephant. Beautiful and easy to work. It's shed and regrown.

name: Unbroken Ivory Tusk
desc: The discarded tusk of a mammoth. It doesn't break, but it sheds and regrows. Even if 100 people step on it, it won't break.

name: Tiny Golem Stone
desc: A stone with a mark to activate a Golem. The mark is so minuscule, the one who wrote it must be a craftsman.

name: Paralysis Poison
desc: Toxic liquid that can paralyze you or poison you, depending on your luck. Or lack of luck.

name: Black Bird Feather
desc: A soft black feather. The quill is rather sharp.

name: Vine
desc: A long, thin vine that can be used to tie down, wind about, and otherwise constrict things.

name: Insect Horn
desc: A jagged insect horn that has a patchy pattern.

name: Mysterious Powder
desc: A.k.a. Zombie Powder. It's veiled in mystery. Undead mystery.

name: Wet Scale
desc: A scale damp with moisture.

name: Magic
desc: An elixir with magic power. It's necessary for wizards.

name: Gold Wolf Fang
desc: A sharp fang that glitters. It takes any prey down with a one bite.

name: Blue Giant's Glove
desc: A glove used by a Blue Giant. Almost impossible to tear it apart. Why you would even try, I have no idea.

name: Thick Stick
desc: A thick stick that can be used for materials, but is not a substitute for lumber. At least you can smack people upside the head with it and laugh!

name: Magic Claw
desc: A sharp claw with magic power. It's the best to equip it with an animal suit.

name: Glistening Blade
desc: A blade of a scythe. It's glistening.

name: Fairy Elixir
desc: Secret fairy item. Fairies are considered full- fledged sprites when they have this.

name: Great Hammer Shard
desc: A shard of a broken hammer that used to be a legendary weapon.

name: Golem Stone
desc: A stone with a mark to activate a Golem. The mark might just come off if you rub it.

name: Blk. Tortoise Shell
desc: A shell that is extremely hard. You need to be skilled enough to work on this.

name: Thunderbird Feather
desc: A soft-textured feather that contains electricity.

name: Big Giant's Nail
desc: A huge fingernail from a big giants. Even grosser!

name: Yellow Feather
desc: A soft-textured yellow feather. It's believed to bring happiness.

name: Quality Worn Cloth
desc: Used to be a high-quality cloth, but it's worn out from overuse.

name: Pirate's Armor
desc: A shoulder guard made of steel.

name: Blade Shard
desc: A small piece of a blade from a knife or something. Don't touch it with your bare hands.

name: Proof of Rank
desc: Proof that you are in a high position. If you lose it... well, it's over.

name: Turnip's Miracle
desc: A mysterious item that is said to show the order of the world. The root of dreams?

name: Dragon Scale
desc: One of many scales that cover a dragon's body. Diamond hard, and also effective as a charm.

name: Golem Spirit Stone
desc: A stone with a mark to activate a Golem. The spirit is unchanging forever.

name: Ancient Orc Cloth
desc: An orc's cloth that is described as a legendary cloth sometimes. But a cloth is a cloth, and an orc is an orc.

name: Queen's Jaw
desc: A jaw that chews everything up except for diamonds. Diamonds are forever!

name: Poison King
desc: Liquid that is very toxic. Just one lick is fatal. So stop licking it!

name: Dangerous Scissors
desc: Scissors that look dangerous. But dangerous means sexy, some people say. Just don't run with them.

name: Chimera's Claw
desc: A claw of a Chimera. It looks amazing enough to be called the claw of a king.

name: Tablet of Truth
desc: A tablet that was once part of a Golem's body. It has 'EMETH' written on it, and serves as a source of power.

name: Big Bird's Comb
desc: A big cock's comb. When you get mad, just try to "comb" down.

name: Battle Turnip
desc: A turnip used during the Turnip Fight, held each year in prayer for a good harvest (and for fun!).

name: Black Scale
desc: A dragon's scale. You feel darkness emanating from it.

name: Blue Scale
desc: An ocean-blue dragon's scale. It makes you feel intelligent just holding it.

name: Glitter Scale
desc: It glitters and shines. Mesmerizing. Like tinfoil.

name: Crimson Scale
desc: A dragon scale the color of flames.

name: Love Scale
desc: A scale that is famous as a love charm. But only few people have ever seen it because of its rarity.

name: Dragonic Stone
desc: A mineral that was believed not to exist in reality.

name: Masu Trout
desc: One of the most common fish. Mostly found in rivers, but sometimes also found out at sea.

name: Squid
desc: A mollusk that's active at night. Uses the fins on its body to swim like it's flying in the water.

name: Taimen
desc: The largest freshwater salmonid. Very rare and valued.

name: Sardine
desc: A fairly easy fish to catch. Swims in shoals, and is often viewed as a beautiful, tasty delight.

name: Char
desc: A fish people just love to catch. Prefers swimming in cold water.

name: Chub
desc: A fish with a dark line on its body. During spawning season, it develops two more lines.

name: Glitter Snapper
desc: A fish with a body of glittering silver. Very easy to spot, but hard to catch.

name: Skipjack
desc: A fall fish that requires power and skill to catch.

name: Turbot
desc: A fish with both eyes situated on the right side of its body. Changes color depending on its environment.

name: Gibelio
desc: Displays unique breeding characteristics due to females outnumbering males. Found in quiet rivers.

name: Salmon
desc: Spends most of its time in the ocean, but swims upstream to spawn in the river. Used in many recipes.

name: Mackerel
desc: Spoils easily. Often grilled or boiled, and often for a long time in order to disguise that it has spoiled. Tsk tsk!

name: Needlefish
desc: Swims near the water's surface with its tiny, thin body. Has an aqua-colored back and a white belly.

name: Pike
desc: Named after its slim, long and slender body. A popular fall fish that's full of nutrients.

name: Sunsquid
desc: A squid from the tropics. Has a tanned body and swims in shallow water.

name: Shrimp
desc: A type of crustacean with its body protected by a hard shell. Has 13 pairs of legs.

name: Snapper
desc: A fish known to bring good luck. Has long been served in festivals and ceremonies.

name: Throbby Snapper
desc: A rare type of snapper that's considered legendary among fishermen.

name: Rainbow Trout
desc: A mid-sized fish that lives in rivers. Very poisonous. During spawning season, the males shine in rainbow colors.

name: Flounder
desc: A fish with both eyes on the left side of its body. Has a larger mouth and sharper teeth than a Turbot.

name: Blowfish
desc: Known as one of the most expensive fish. Filled with poison, requiring high skill to cook safely.

name: Yellowtail
desc: A stock name given to numerous varieties of fish. All have large bodies and are renowned for bringing good luck.

name: Crucian Carp
desc: Matures fast, and also lives long. Mostly eats plankton. Requires both skill and luck to catch.

name: Tuna
desc: A large and tasty fish that's widely loved. Traded at high prices and generally found in deep waters.

name: Girella
desc: A winter fish caught in the ocean. Easy to find, but renowned for its powerful pull.

name: Fall Flounder
desc: A fish that looks like fallen leaves. When seen swimming, you'd just think there's debris floating by.

name: Cherry Salmon
desc: A small freshwater fish. Found in various places due to its popularity -- it's often "stocked."

name: Lamp Squid
desc: A squid with a lamp-shaped body. The lamp holds poison with a sealing effect, so it must be cooked with caution.

name: Lobster
desc: A giant shrimp with walking legs. Its two large front claws are used to threaten enemies.

name: Pond Smelt
desc: Thin and small, but adaptive, with a large habitat. Most often found during ice fishing.

name: Sand Flounder
desc: A unique fish that swims in the sand. Gets nutrition from small minerals, making its body firm and sandy.

name: Rockfish
desc: A unique fish that swims in the sand. Has a hard head that can crush even rocks.

name: Can
desc: An empty can that someone tossed aside. Don't follow suit -- littering is bad!

name: Boot
desc: An old boot that was found floating in the water. Worn-out and useless.

name: Rare Can
