desc: A rare can that's no longer manufactured. Worth a lot among collectors.

name: Rock
desc: An ordinary rock. Hit it with a hammer to make usable material out of it.

name: Branch
desc: A tree branch that blew in. Chop it up with an axe to make Lumber.

name: Lumber
desc: Wood needed to build buildings. Always keep a lot of it in stock -- it will definitely come in handy!

name: Material Stone
desc: Stones needed to build buildings. Always keep a lot of them in stock -- they will absolutely come in handy!

name: Escape
desc: Used for instant transport. Where it takes you depends on where you use it, but the last stop is always home.

name: Fireball
desc: Hurls small fireballs. Can hurl up to 3 at a time.

name: Big Fire
desc: Hurls large fireballs. Can hurl up to 2 at a time.

name: Explosion
desc: Hurls giant fireballs that cause explosions on impact, damaging their surroundings.

name: Water Laser
desc: Emits a water beam that can penetrate stone. The longer you maintain it, the bigger the impact.

name: Parallel Laser
desc: Emits 2 water beams that can penetrate stone. The longer you maintain them, the bigger the impact.

name: Delta Laser
desc: Emits 3 water beams that can penetrate stone. Particularly effective when surrounded by foes.

name: Screw Rock
desc: Summons sharp rocks that substitute for your fists. Designed for fighter mages.

name: Earth Spike
desc: Summons stone pillars that track enemies and strike them from below.

name: Avenger Rock
desc: Stabs its target with a large rock. Also known as the "drill punch."

name: Sonic Wind
desc: Emits spinning wind blades that automatically track and shred their foes to pieces.

name: Double Sonic
desc: Emits 2 spinning wind blades. Their arched trajectory makes it hard to attack enemies in front.

name: Penetrate Sonic
desc: Emits 3 spinning wind blades that move freely in multiple directions, shredding to bits all who get in their way.

name: Light Barrier
desc: Emits 2 light balls in front of you, protecting from enemies.

name: Shine
desc: Emits 4 light balls that spin around you, protecting you from enemies.

name: Prism
desc: Emits spinning light balls. Provides complete protection from all enemies for a short while.

name: Dark Ball
desc: Emits a dark light ball that travels slowly and destroys everything in its way.

name: Dark Snake
desc: Emits a dark light ball that snakes forward slowly and destroys everything in its path.

name: Darkness
desc: Forbidden spell that summons an entrance to the depths of darkness.

name: Cure
desc: Recovers HP, for yourself and for nearby companions. Doesn't recover much, but uses few RP.

name: Cure All
desc: Recovers a lot of HP for you and your companions, even if they're not close by. Uses lots of RP.

name: Master Cure
desc: Greatly recovers HP, but consumes a large amount of RP in the process.

name: Medipoison
desc: Cures poison. A purifying light will cleanse the toxins in your body.

name: Mediparalyze
desc: Cures paralysis. A purifying light will enable you to move once more.

name: Mediseal
desc: Cures seals. A purifying light will bring back your inner power.

name: Greeting Spell
desc: If you say hello, even people who don't like you will say hi back. They'll be your special friends. Your special awake friends.

name: Power Wave
desc: Weapon: Short Sword Charge power to release shock waves.

name: Dash Slash
desc: Weapon: Short Sword Close the gap between enemies in an instant. Good timing may net you an additional leg drop.

name: Rush Attack
desc: Weapon: Short Sword Press the button repeatedly for additional attacks and a finisher.

name: Round Break
desc: Weapon: Short Sword A cyclone attack that blows away foes. Great to use when surrounded.

name: Mind Thrust
desc: Weapon: Short Sword Find and attack your enemy's weak point. May inflict status ailments as well.

name: Gust
desc: Weapon: Dual Blades Jump up and soar in the air. Also useful for dodging attacks.

name: Storm
desc: Weapon: Dual Blades Execute continuous attacks in the air. Keep pressing the button for additional moves.

name: Blitz
desc: Weapon: Dual Blades Speed up attack rate by sharpening concentration.

name: Twin Attack
desc: Weapon: Dual Blades Stab, twist and pull -- like a psychotic mantra. Simple, but effective.

name: Rail Strike
desc: Weapon: Dual Blades A jump-spin attack. Dynamic and hard to counter.

name: Wind Slash
desc: Weapon: Long Sword A vertical jump-spin attack. Keep pressing the button to increase the number of spins.

name: Flash Strike
desc: Weapon: Long Sword Blow away foes with one swing. Covers wide areas very effectively.

name: Naive Blade
desc: Weapon: Long Sword Anticipate your enemy's attacks and quickly strike back.

name: Steel Heart
desc: Weapon: Long Sword Become strong enough not to stagger when attacked, but take more damage.

name: Delta Strike
desc: Weapon: Long Sword A fluid attack of lunging and cutting.

name: Hurricane
desc: Weapon: Spear A fancy attack with a toss, spin and juggle.

name: Reaper Slash
desc: Weapon: Spear Long-ranged attack. Best used when surrounded.

name: Millionstrike
desc: Weapon: Spear A swift stab. Creates shock waves to hit multiple times.

name: Axel Disaster
desc: Weapon: Spear Spinning and boring. Must face the enemy head-on to inflict continuous damage.

name: Stardust Upper
desc: Weapon: Axe/Hammer Knock enemies into the air. They can also be attacked while spinning.

name: Tornado Swing
desc: Weapon: Axe/Hammer Spinning lunge attack. Keep pressing the button to increase the number of spins. Just don't make yourself dizzy!

name: Grand Impact
desc: Weapon: Axe/Hammer Hit the ground and cause an earthquake. Press the button for multiple hits.

name: Giga Swing
desc: Weapon: Axe/Hammer With its incredible strength, enemies are blown back until they hit something.

name: Upper Cut
desc: Weapon: Fist Launch enemies into the air.

name: Double Kick
desc: Weapon: Fist Spin and kick enemies so hard.

name: Straight Punch
desc: Weapon: Fist Concentrate and give foes a strong blow.

name: Neko Damashi
desc: Weapon: Open Hand A legendary technique using palm of the hand to cause distress and surprise all in one!

name: Rush Punch
desc: Weapon: Fist Punch many times at high speed. Enemies are already dead.

name: Cyclone
desc: Weapon: Fist Blow away enemies by spinning your body super fast.

name: Rapid Move
desc: Weapon: Fist Move toward an enemy in an instant. Also useful to dodge attacks.

name: Bonus Concerto
desc: A musical score that inspires allied monsters to do their best in combat.

name: Striking March
desc: A musical score that powers up allied monsters' strength until the end of the day.

name: Iron Waltz
desc: A musical score that powers up allied monsters' defense until the end of the day.

name: Minerals
desc: Used as materials to create tools, weapons, and armor. Mainly collected by hitting rocks with a hammer.

name: Liquids
desc: Shapeless matter that is used as a material.

name: Claws and Fangs
desc: Monsters' body parts used to attack foes such as "Insect Jaws" and "Panther Claws." Often used to reinforce weapons.

name: Sticks and Stems
desc: Often used as a shaft or handle.

name: Cloths and Skins
desc: Soft and plate-shaped substances for making clothes such as "Insect Carapace" and "Cheap Cloth."

name: Furs
desc: Monster furs and such that are soft and strong.

name: Strings
desc: Long cotton-like materials used to tie things down or connect.

name: Shards
desc: Shards that were once a part of something such as "Arrowheads" and "Blade Shards."

name: Powders and Spores
desc: Powders that mostly have magic power in them such as "Spores" and "Fairy Dust."

name: Scales
desc: Monster scales that are very hard and precious such as "Wet Scales" and "Dragon Scales."

name: Shells and Bones
desc: Because of their overall solidness, they're very useful as armor.

name: Stones
desc: Stones used as materials. Nobody really cares about them, but they're useful.

name: Turnip
desc: The king of all crops. It has been through many hardships to stay in this position. Bow down to the turnip.

name: Crystals
desc: Substances made of runes that have crystalized. Often imbued with magic power.

name: Jewels
desc: Precious stones with magic power such as "Amethysts" and "Aquamarine." Mostly collected from colored minerals.

name: Feathers
desc: Fluffy, soft and downy feathers.

name: Jam
desc: Jam made by boiling fruits. Usually eaten with bread.

name: Curry
desc: Staple dishes often served in households such as "Curry Rice" and "Dry Curry."

name: Squid
desc: A mollusk that's active at night. Uses the fins on its body to swim like it's flying in the water.

name: Battle Turnip
desc: A turnip used during the Turnip Fight, held each year in prayer for a good harvest (and for fun!).

name: Gold Battle Turnip
desc: A turnip used during the Turnip Fight. You can score big with one of these!

name: Bullet
desc: Score high by hitting turnips with this bullet!

name: Golden Bullet
desc: Score high by hitting turnips with this bullet!

name: Cherry Turnip
desc: A turnip used during the Turnip Fight, held each year in prayer for a good harvest (and for fun!).

name: Disgusting Food
desc: A failed meal often employed during the Turnip Fight. Mainly used for defense.
